text.content:
Dazing Thud

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Bludgeoning

Cheek Pierced

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to cast spells with a verbal component until healed.

Piercing

Across the Eyes

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} until healed.

Slashing

Slowed Down

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2} for 1 round.

Bomb or Spell
